data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Sally wrote to her favorite celebrity one month ago. She ____ him ____ write ____, ____ included ____ envelope ____ her ____. She ____ been ____ forward ____ hearing ____ him ____ since. Her mother told her not to get too excited about him replying, because he is a very busy person.
data.partBlankContent: Sally wrote to her favorite celebrity one month ago. She as___ him t_ write ba__, a__ included a_ envelope wi__ her add____. She h__ been loo____ forward t_ hearing fr__ him ev__ since. Her mother told her not to get too excited about him replying, because he is a very busy person.
data.answer: 莎莉一个月前给她最喜欢的名人写信。她让他回信，并附上了一个写有她地址的信封。从那以后，她一直期待着收到他的来信。她妈妈告诉她不要对他的回复太兴奋，因为他是一个非常忙的人。
